title: Morning Dew
author: Anonymous
content:
Morning dew falls soft
On petals of cherry bloom
Spring awakens slow

title: City Lights
author: Anonymous
content:
Neon lights flicker
Through windows of sleepless nights
Urban dreams take flight

title: The Lazy Cat
author: Anonymous
content:
There once was a cat quite lazy
Whose napping made everyone crazy
It slept through the day
In a comfortable way
And dreamed of fish that were hazy

title: Ocean Waves
author: Anonymous
content:
Endless waves crash down
Against the weathered shoreline
Timeless rhythm flows
